duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet / exceed sales goals and objectives for assigned territory.
Collaborate with Regional Sales Manager to establish goals.
Profitably grow territory.
Demonstrate thorough understanding and execution of each step in the sales process.
Understand territory, segments, and prioritize schedule.
Identify opportunities, and develop proactive call plans.
Develop thorough understanding of customer, their business, identify needs and opportunities.
Link WG capabilities with customer needs – identify solutions.
Present compelling proposals, and secure commitment.
Own transitions, engage relevant business functions, and follow through to ensure customer expectations are exceeded.
Expand relationships, identify new opportunities, and continuously bring value to WG partners.
Focus on retention of partner accounts, taking ownership of all account activity, and customer experience.
Continue to penetrate and add value for partner accounts.
Attend events and shows as needed.
Exhibit thorough understanding of the business – both internally and externally.
Collaborate and communicate across functions to grow sales and satisfy customer needs.
Effectively communicates the needs of customers to necessary departments including operations, transportation, and marketing.
Effectively organize and prioritize work.
Select appropriate targets.
Focus on targets.
Take necessary time to prepare, developing professional agendas for sales calls.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business related field is preferred with three to five years of sales related experience and/or training.
